Key Match Events: Freddie Freeman hit a walk-off grand slam with two outs in Game 1 to turn a one-run deficit into a three-run victory.
Yoshinobu Yamamoto had an excellent start in Game 2, contributing to the Dodgers' win.
The Yankees broke out in Game 4 to force a Game 5.
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees won the AL East, then took down the Kansas City Royals in the ALDS and the Cleveland Guardians in the ALCS.
This is the Yankees' first Fall Classic since 2009, when they beat the Philadelphia Phillies to secure their 27th championship.
The Dodgers won the NL West, then beat the San Diego Padres in the NLDS and the New York Mets in the NLCS.
The Dodgers have made the World Series four times since 2017, winning it all in the pandemic-shortened 2020 season.
The probable pitchers for Game 5 are RHP Gerrit Cole (NYY) vs. RHP Jack Flaherty (LAD).
The Yankees' lineup is stacked with sluggers: Aaron Judge, Juan Soto, Giancarlo Stanton.
The Dodgers' roster includes Shohei Ohtani, Mookie Betts, Freddie Freeman, and Yoshinobu Yamamoto.
